SMW Subobject for HumanNPC location: Ver SinhazaUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 8209, 8332Examine: An important vampyre.Release date: 24 May 2018Image: File:Vyrelord (human form).pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Vyrelord

Vyrelords are vampyre nobles from Darkmeyer who are found in Ver Sinhaza to spectate citizens participating in the Theatre of Blood. They are the male counterpart of the Vyrelady.

Dialogue[edit | edit source]

This article on an NPC has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations with this NPC.
